com.rivescript.lang

Class Perl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivescript.lang.Perl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectHandler

    public class Perl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectHandler
    Perl programming language support for RiveScript-Java.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Perl(RiveScript rivescript, java.lang.String rsp4j)
      Create a Perl handler.

      java.lang.String onCall(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String[] args)
      Handler for when a user invokes the object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Perl

        public Perl(RiveScript rivescript,
            java.lang.String rsp4j)
        Create a Perl handler. Must take the path to the rsp4j script as its argument.
        Parameters:
        rivescript - Instance of your RiveScript object.
        rsp4j - Path to the rsp4j script (either in .pl or .exe format).

    • Method Detail

      • onLoad

        public boolean onLoad(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String[] code)
        Handler for when object code is read (loaded) by RiveScript. Should return true for success or false to indicate error.
        Specified by:
        onLoad in interface ObjectHandler
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the object.
        code - The source code inside the object.

      • onCall

        public java.lang.String onCall(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String user,
                               java.lang.String[] args)
        Handler for when a user invokes the object. Should return the text reply from the object.
        Specified by:
        onCall in interface ObjectHandler
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the object being called.
        user - The user's ID.
        args - The argument list from the call tag.
